title: Nieuwsjagers
resume: Follow the daily hunt for firsts at the editorial board of a popular newspaper. From glory moment to dramatic event, a journalist is on standby day and night in a race against time and their competition. Because Nieuwsjagers (News Hunters) are the people who decide what you will talk about tomorrow.
